appetizers.name: Bacon and Cheese Fries
appetizers.description: Fries with Bacon and Cheese on them. What more do you want.

cold_sandwiches.name: Chicken Waldorf
cold_sandwiches.description: You'll love the combination of satisfying chicken combined with tart apples, crunchy celery and walnuts and sweet dried cranberries in a tangy, homemade mayonnaise-mustard dressing.

cold_sandwiches.name: Salami, Mozzarella, and Roasted Red Pepper
cold_sandwiches.description: This easy, scrumptious Italian sandwich is made with fresh mozzarella, zesty salami, sweet roasted red peppers, vibrant basil leaves and rich, buttery olive oil.

hot_sandwiches.name: Reuben
hot_sandwiches.description: The Reuben sandwich is an American hot sandwich composed of corned beef, Swiss cheese, sauerkraut, and Russian dressing, grilled between slices of rye bread.

hot_sandwiches.name: Grilled Cheese
hot_sandwiches.description: A cheese sandwich is a basic sandwich generally made with one or more varieties of cheese on any sort of bread, such as flat bread or wheat bread, that may include spreads such as butter or mayonnaise.
